participant_1.background:
I make time for my favorite hobbies, which include hiking and reading.
I do my best to be a good parent, but it's not always easy.
My rock collection is my favorite thing in the world.
I have a soccer ball in my baby's nursery.
i am from georgia.

participant_2.background:
I have a computer that is small enough for me to use comfortably, and it has all the features I need to design and create my own unique French fry creations.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
my wife stays home with our kids.
My medication makes me sleepy sometimes, so I once pretended to be asleep in my car in order to get out of a speeding ticket.
Social media is not my thing.

content.text: I love to hike, and I have a huge rock collection. What are your favorite hobbies?
I have a small computer that I use to design and create my own unique French fry creations. It's very cool, but I'm not sure if it's a hobby. I guess it's more like a passion.
That's really cool! I love French fries, so I'd love to see some of your creations.
Sure, I'd be happy to show you. I just have to make sure I have my computer with me.
Awesome! I can't wait to see them.
I'm glad you like them! I'm always trying to come up with new and innovative ways to make French fries.
It's obvious that you have a lot of passion for this. I'm really impressed.
Thank you! I'm glad you like my work.
I do! Do you ever share your creations with anyone else?
Not really, no. I'm not sure anyone would be interested.
I'm sure they would! I'm definitely interested, and I'm sure there are others who would be too.
Well, maybe I'll start sharing them more then. Thanks for the encouragement.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to support someone who is passionate about their work
